consent.consentDeclarationText: You declare that you have read the foregoing and you give your consent, to the necessary extent, to the content of this paragraph.
consent.optionalCommunicationsLabelText: You wish to be kept informed of the Operator's commercial and social activities by means of electronic communications (SMS, e-mail, social networks...). You will have the option to unsubscribe at any time.

pdf.title: Privacy Protection

alert.mandatoryCheckboxRequired: - The mandatory consent box must be checked.
